name: The Oracle of Delphi
description:
This is a walking simulator created to educate and entertain. 
Has a Greek Mythology theme.

Gameplay, story, programming was all done by HcjLowe.

Sounds and music were created by Melu.

Assets were done in Maya and Adobe products.

Engine used was Unreal Engine 4.

A nature pack to obtain rocks and boulders was from the Megascans package on Epic Launcher store.
